tns:pair.p: This formula has no detailed description. This usually indicates that it is not intended for use.

tns:pair.value: s[well,plate] := average of scored replicate wells

tns:root.tns:pair: The average/mean of the scored replicate well values

tns:pair.value: s[well,plate] := median of scored replicate wells

tns:root.tns:pair: The median of the scored replicate well values

tns:pair.value: scored well value:= (normalised well value minus the median of normalised sample well values of that physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ normalised sample well values minus the median of normalised sample well values for each replicate group] for each replicate group)

scored well value:= (normalised well value minus the median of normalised sample well values of that physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ normalised sample well values minus the median of normalised sample well values of that physical plate] of that physical plate)

scored well value:= (normalised well value minus the mean of normalised sample well values of that physical plate) divided by ( standard deviation of [ normalised sample well values minus the mean of normalised sample well values for each replicate group] for each replicate group)

scored well value:= (normalised well value minus the mean of normalised sample well values of that physical plate) divided by ( standard deviation of [ normalised sample well values minus the mean of normalised sample well values of that physical plate] of that physical plate)

tns:root.tns:pair: For each replicate (as independent experiments) the value of median and MAD is computed for the sample wells. The result is the result of (normalised well value minus median of samples) divided by the mad of the samples

tns:pair.value: Not scoring, not summarising.

scored normalised well value:= ( (average of normalised pos well values for each physical plate minus normalised well value) divided by (average of normalised pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of normalised neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ (average of normalised pos well values for each physical plate minus normalised sample well values ) divided by (average of normalised pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of normalised neg well values for each physical plate)] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= (well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100%

normalised well value:= ( (well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( sample well values ) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( sample well values ) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= (well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100%

normalised well value:= ( (well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( sample well values ) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( sample well values ) divided by (average of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= ( logarithm (2) of well value ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100%

normalised well value:= ( ( logarithm (2) of well value ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( logarithm (2) of sample well values ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( ( logarithm (2) of well value ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( logarithm (2) of sample well values ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate) multiplied by 100] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:=well value minus the median of sample well values of that physical plate

normalised well value:= (well value minus the median of sample well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ sample well values minus the median of sample well values for each physical plate] for each physical plate)

tns:pair.b: This is the Z score (by plate).
tns:pair.p: It is computed plate-by-plate bases (plate means physical plate in this case).

tns:pair.value: normalised well value:= (well value minus the median of sample well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ sample well values minus the median of sample well values for each physical plate] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= (well value) divided by ( median of sample well values for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (well value) divided by ( median of sample well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( sample well values ) divided by ( median of sample well values for each physical plate)] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (well value) divided by ( median of sample well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( sample well values ) divided by ( median of sample well values for each physical plate)] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= logarithm (2) of well value minus the median of logarithm (2) of sample well values for each physical plate

normalised well value:= ( logarithm (2) of well value minus the median of logarithm (2) of sample well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ logarithm (2) of sample well values minus the median of logarithm (2) of sample well values for each physical plate] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( logarithm (2) of well value minus the median of logarithm (2) of sample well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ logarithm (2) of sample well values minus the median of logarithm (2) of sample well values for each physical plate] for each replicate group )
well value minus the median of neg well values for each physical plate

normalised well value:= (well value minus the median of neg well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ sample well values minus the median of neg well values for each physical plate] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= (well value minus the median of neg well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ sample well values minus the median of neg well values for each physical plate] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= (well value) divided by ( median of neg well values for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (well value) divided by ( median of neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( sample well values ) divided by ( median of neg well values for each physical plate)] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (well value) divided by ( median of neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ ( sample well values ) divided by ( median of neg well values for each physical plate)] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= logarithm (2) of well value minus the median of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate

normalised well value:= ( logarithm (2) of well value minus the median of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ logarithm (2) of sample well values minus the median of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( logarithm (2) of well value minus the median of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ logarithm (2) of sample well values minus the median of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate] for each replicate group )

normalised well value:= (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus sample well values ) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate)] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus sample well values ) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate)] for each replicate group )

normalised well value:= (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus sample well values ) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate)] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus well value) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ (average of pos well values for each physical plate minus sample well values ) divided by (average of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of neg well values for each physical plate)] for each replicate group )

normalised well value:= (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate minus logarithm (2) of well value ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate minus logarithm (2) of well value ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate minus logarithm (2) of sample well values ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate)] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate minus logarithm (2) of well value ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate) ) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate minus logarithm (2) of sample well values ) divided by (average of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each plate,replicate group minus average of logarithm (2) of neg well values for each physical plate)] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= shorth of sample well values for each physical plate

normalised well value:= (well value minus the shorth of pos well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ sample well values minus the shorth of pos well values for each physical plate] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= (well value minus the shorth of pos well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ sample well values minus the shorth of pos well values for each physical plate] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= shorth of sample well values for each physical plate

normalised well value:= (well value minus the shorth of pos well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ sample well values minus the shorth of pos well values for each physical plate] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= (well value minus the shorth of pos well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ sample well values minus the shorth of pos well values for each physical plate] for each replicate group )
normalised well value:= shorth of logarithm (2) of sample well values for each physical plate

normalised well value:= ( logarithm (2) of well value minus the shorth of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ logarithm (2) of sample well values minus the shorth of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate] for each physical plate)

normalised well value:= ( logarithm (2) of well value minus the shorth of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate) divided by ( median absolute deviation of [ logarithm (2) of sample well values minus the shorth of logarithm (2) of pos well values for each physical plate] for each replicate group )
